omschrijving: Born 26/04/2011 - his pedigree name is Carmichael's Nice 'n Nasty. In practice he seems to find a perfect balance between the Happy/Nice &Nasty & is a wonderful companion. He succesfully completed 4 Puppy & young adult training courses
The origin of Happy, where are the joy began. A great kennel that litterally breads love into puppies.

With five vets, a specialist and seven assistants we enjoy working at these two modern locations and we are open here from Monday to Friday between 9 am and 8 pm for appointments, operations, examinations and the collection of food and medicines. On Saturdays we are open from 1 p.m. to 3 p.m. for appointments and collecting food, etc. at the Batau location.
